mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH FROM ROOM A INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE B ON A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE WHERE A.ROOMCODE IN (SELECT ROOMCODE FROM ROOM MINUS SELECT DISTINCT ROOMCODE FROM BOOKING WHERE CHECKIN >= #{param1} AND CHECKOUT <= #{param2}) ORDER BY A.ROOMCODE

SELECT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH, C.CHECKIN, C.CHECKOUT, C.BOOKCODE, C.MOBILE, C.NAME, C.PERSON FROM ROOM A INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE B ON A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE LEFT JOIN BOOKING C ON A.ROOMCODE = C.ROOMCODE WHERE C.CHECKIN >= #{param1} AND C.CHECKOUT <= #{param2} ORDER BY C.CHECKIN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING(BOOKCODE, ROOMCODE, PERSON, CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, NAME, MOBILE) VALUES(SEQ_BOOK.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKING SET PERSON=#{param2}, NAME=#{param3}, MOBILE=#{param4} WHERE BOOKCODE=#{param1}
